verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764> upon Aijeleth <WH365> Shahar <WH7837>, A Psalm <WH4210> of David <WH1732>. My 'Elohim <WH410>, my 'Elohim <WH410>, why hast thou forsaken <WH5800> <WH8804> me? why art thou so far <WH7350> from helping <WH3444> me, and from the words <WH1697> of my roaring <WH7581> ?
O my 'Elohim <WH430>, I cry <WH7121> <WH8799> in the daytime <WH3119>, but thou hearest <WH6030> <WH8799> not; and in the night season <WH3915>, and am not silent <WH1747>.
But thou art holy <WH6918>, O thou that inhabitest <WH3427> <WH8802> the praises <WH8416> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
Our fathers <WH1> trusted <WH982> <WH8804> in thee: they trusted <WH982> <WH8804>, and thou didst deliver <WH6403> <WH8762> them.
They cried <WH2199> <WH8804> unto thee, and were delivered <WH4422> <WH8738>: they trusted <WH982> <WH8804> in thee, and were not confounded <WH954> <WH8804>.
But I am a worm <WH8438>, and no man <WH376>; a reproach <WH2781> of men <WH120>, and despised <WH959> <WH8803> of the people <WH5971>.
All they that see <WH7200> <WH8802> me laugh me to scorn <WH3932> <WH8686>: they shoot out <WH6358> <WH8686> the lip <WH8193>, they shake <WH5128> <WH8686> the head <WH7218>, saying,
He trusted <WH1556> <WH8800> on the YY <WH3068> that he would deliver <WH6403> <WH8762> him: let him deliver <WH5337> <WH8686> him, seeing he delighted <WH2654> <WH8804> in him.
But thou art he that took <WH1518> <WH8801> me out of the womb <WH990>: thou didst make me hope <WH982> <WH8688> when I was upon my mother's <WH517> breasts <WH7699>.
I was cast <WH7993> <WH8717> upon thee from the womb <WH7358>: thou art my 'Elohim <WH410> from my mother's <WH517> belly <WH990>.
Be not far <WH7368> <WH8799> from me; for trouble <WH6869> is near <WH7138>; for there is none to help <WH5826> <WH8802>.
Many <WH7227> bulls <WH6499> have compassed <WH5437> <WH8804> me: strong <WH47> bulls of Bashan <WH1316> have beset me round <WH3803> <WH8765>.
They gaped <WH6475> <WH8804> upon me with their mouths <WH6310>, as a ravening <WH2963> <WH8802> and a roaring <WH7580> <WH8802> lion <WH738>.

I am poured out <WH8210> <WH8738> like water <WH4325>, and all my bones <WH6106> are out of joint <WH6504> <WH8694>: my heart <WH3820> is like wax <WH1749>; it is melted <WH4549> <WH8738> in the midst <WH8432> of my bowels <WH4578>.

My strength <WH3581> is dried up <WH3001> <WH8804> like a potsherd <WH2789>; and my tongue <WH3956> cleaveth <WH1692> <WH8716> to my jaws <WH4455>; and thou hast brought <WH8239> <WH8799> me into the dust <WH6083> of death <WH4194>.

For dogs <WH3611> have compassed <WH5437> <WH8804> me: the assembly <WH5712> of the wicked <WH7489> <WH8688> have inclosed <WH5362> <WH8689> me: they pierced <WH3738> <WH8804> <WH8675> <WH738> my hands <WH3027> and my feet <WH7272>.
I may tell <WH5608> <WH8762> all my bones <WH6106>: they look <WH5027> <WH8686> and stare <WH7200> <WH8799> upon me.
They part <WH2505> <WH8762> my garments <WH899> among them, and cast <WH5307> <WH8686> lots <WH1486> upon my vesture <WH3830>.
But be not thou far <WH7368> <WH8799> from me, O YY <WH3068>: O my strength <WH360>, haste <WH2363> <WH8798> thee to help <WH5833> me.
Deliver <WH5337> <WH8685> my soul <WH5315> from the sword <WH2719>; my darling <WH3173> from the power <WH3027> of the dog <WH3611>.
Save <WH3467> <WH8685> me from the lion's <WH738> mouth <WH6310>: for thou hast heard <WH6030> <WH8804> me from the shofars <WH7161> of the unicorns <WH7214>.
I will declare <WH5608> <WH8762> thy name <WH8034> unto my brethren <WH251>: in the midst <WH8432> of the congregation <WH6951> will I praise <WH1984> <WH8762> thee.

Ye that fear <WH3373> the YY <WH3068>, praise <WH1984> <WH8761> him; all ye the seed <WH2233> of Ya`akov <WH3290>, glorify <WH3513> <WH8761> him; and fear <WH1481> <WH8798> him, all ye the seed <WH2233> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

For he hath not despised <WH959> <WH8804> nor abhorred <WH8262> <WH8765> the affliction <WH6039> of the afflicted <WH6041>; neither hath he hid <WH5641> <WH8689> his face <WH6440> from him; but when he cried <WH7768> <WH8763> unto him, he heard <WH8085> <WH8804>.
My praise <WH8416> shall be of thee in the great <WH7227> congregation <WH6951>: I will pay <WH7999> <WH8762> my vows <WH5088> before them that fear <WH3373> him.

The meek <WH6035> shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> and be satisfied <WH7646> <WH8799>: they shall praise <WH1984> <WH8762> the YY <WH3068> that seek <WH1875> <WH8802> him: your heart <WH3824> shall live <WH2421> <WH8799> for ever <WH5703>.

All the ends <WH657> of the world <WH776> shall remember <WH2142> <WH8799> and turn <WH7725> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068>: and all the kindreds <WH4940> of the nations <WH1471> shall worship <WH7812> <WH8691> before <WH6440> thee.
For the kingdom <WH4410> is the YY'S <WH3068>: and he is the governor <WH4910> <WH8802> among the nations <WH1471>.

All they that be fat <WH1879> upon earth <WH776> shall eat <WH398> <WH8804> and worship <WH7812> <WH8691>: all they that go down <WH3381> <WH8802> to the dust <WH6083> shall bow <WH3766> <WH8799> before <WH6440> him: and none can keep alive <WH2421> <WH8765> his own soul <WH5315>.
A seed <WH2233> shall serve <WH5647> <WH8799> him; it shall be accounted <WH5608> <WH8792> to the YY <WH136> for a generation <WH1755>.
They shall come <WH935> <WH8799>, and shall declare <WH5046> <WH8686> his righteousness <WH6666> unto a people <WH5971> that shall be born <WH3205> <WH8737>, that he hath done <WH6213> <WH8804> this.
